description:
The comfy, modern studio is newly renovated, with brand new kitchen, bathroom, in unit washer/ dryer, and air conditioner. My place is next to Subway Line 1, 5 minutes to Columbia University, 15 minutes to Time Square and Central Park. Free street side parking, surrounded by Cafe and Restaurants. Queen size solid bed, beautiful couch, high speed WIFI, and modern bathroom. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

Next to riverside river. Great for a walk along the hudson river with fabulous view. Have tons of restaurants including McDonalds, Donuts, subway, Mexican food, Chinese food, Japanese food, bar, and cafe.

My place is next to Subway Line 1, 5 minutes to Columbia University, 15 minutes to Time Square and Central Park. Free street side parking.
name: Modern luxury apt 5 min to Columbia University
review: It's a very nice , up to date apartment. I loved it
